title: Direct Instruction Effectiveness Analysis: Case Study in the Social Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies curriculum knowledge and vocational foundational competencies
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical application through project-based assessment with smartphone-based supplementary materials

learning_goals: Accurately explain the core principles of direct instruction (explicit teaching, systematic example selection) with at least 80% accuracy.
Apply direct instruction techniques to social domain topics and design a lesson plan with three or more stages.
Achieve at least 85% completeness in project evaluations by utilizing instructional materials reflecting direct instruction elements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
